dim.name: nCells
dim.description: The number of Voronoi cells in the primal mesh

dim.name: nEdges
dim.description: The number of cell faces (edges) in the primal and dual meshes

dim.name: maxEdges
dim.description: The largest number of neighbors that a primal mesh cell may have

dim.name: nVertices
dim.description: The number of Delaunay triangles in the dual mesh, equivalent to the number of cell corners in the primal mesh

dim.name: vertexDegree
dim.description: The number of edges or cells that meet at vertices

dim.name: nSoilLevels
dim.description: The number of soil layers used by the land-surface scheme

dim.name: nFGLevels
dim.description: The number of first-guess atmospheric layers

dim.name: nFGSoilLevels
dim.description: The number of first-guess soil layers

dim.name: nVertLevelsP1
dim.description: The number of atmospheric levels, always one more than the number of layers

dim.name: nMonths
dim.description: The number of months in a year

nml_option.name: config_init_case
nml_option.description:
Type of initial conditions to create: 
ewline 1 = Jablonowski & Williamson barolinic wave (no initial perturbation), 
ewline 2 = Jablonowski & Williamson barolinic wave (with initial perturbation), 
ewline 3 = Jablonowski & Williamson barolinic wave (with normal-mode perturbation), 
ewline 4 = squall line, 
ewline 5 = super-cell, 
ewline 6 = mountain wave, 
ewline 7 = real-data initial conditions from, e.g., GFS, 
ewline 8 = surface field (SST, sea-ice) update file for use with real-data simulations 
ewline 9 = lateral boundary conditions update file for use with real-data simulations

nml_option.name: config_calendar_type
nml_option.description: Simulation calendar type

nml_option.name: config_start_time
nml_option.description: Time to begin processing first-guess data (cases 7, 8, and 9 only)

nml_option.name: config_stop_time
nml_option.description: Time to end processing first-guess data (cases 8 and 9 only)

nml_option.name: config_theta_adv_order
nml_option.description: Horizontal advection order for theta

nml_option.name: config_coef_3rd_order
nml_option.description: Upwinding coefficient in the 3rd order advection scheme

nml_option.name: config_num_halos
nml_option.description: Number of halo layers for fields
nml_option.possible_values: Integer values, typically 2 or 3; DO NOT CHANGE

nml_option.name: config_nvertlevels
nml_option.description: The number of vertical levels to be used in the model

nml_option.name: config_nsoillevels
nml_option.description: The number of vertical soil levels needed by LSM in the model (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_nfglevels
nml_option.description: The number of atmospheric levels (including surface and sea-level) in the first-guess dataset (cases 7 and 9 only)

nml_option.name: config_nfgsoillevels
nml_option.description: The number of vertical soil levels in the first-guess dataset (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_months
nml_option.description: The number of months in a year

nml_option.name: config_geog_data_path
nml_option.description: Path to the WPS static data files (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_met_prefix
nml_option.description: Filename prefix of ungrib intermediate file to use for initial conditions (cases 7 and 9 only)

nml_option.name: config_sfc_prefix
nml_option.description: Filename prefix of ungrib intermediate file to use for SST and sea-ice (cases 7 and 8 only)

nml_option.name: config_fg_interval
nml_option.description: Interval between intermediate files (cases 8 and 9 only)

nml_option.name: config_landuse_data
nml_option.description: The land use classification to use (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_topo_data
nml_option.description: The topography dataset to use for the model terrain and for GWDO static fields (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_vegfrac_data
nml_option.description: The climatological monthly vegetation fraction dataset to use (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_albedo_data
nml_option.description: The climatological monthly albedo dataset to use (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_maxsnowalbedo_data
nml_option.description: The maximum snow albedo dataset to use (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_supersample_factor
nml_option.description: The supersampling factor to be used for MODIS maximum snow albedo and monthly albedo datasets (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_use_spechumd
nml_option.description: Whether to use specific-humidity as the first-guess moisture variable. If this option is False, relative humidity will be used.

nml_option.name: config_ztop
nml_option.description: Model top height

nml_option.name: config_nsmterrain
nml_option.description: Number of smoothing passes to apply to the interpolated terrain field

nml_option.name: config_smooth_surfaces
nml_option.description: Whether to smooth zeta surfaces

nml_option.name: config_dzmin
nml_option.description: Minimum thickness of layers as a fraction of nominal thickness

nml_option.name: config_nsm
nml_option.description: Maximum number of smoothing passes for coordinate surfaces

nml_option.name: config_tc_vertical_grid
nml_option.description: Whether to use the vertical layer profile that was developed for use in real-time TC experiments

nml_option.name: config_specified_zeta_levels
nml_option.description: The name of a text file containing a list of vertical coordinate (zeta) values in increasing order at layer interfaces.

nml_option.name: config_blend_bdy_terrain
nml_option.description: Whether to blend terrain along domain boundaries with first-guess terrain. Only useful for limited-area domains.

nml_option.name: config_extrap_airtemp
nml_option.description: Method of extrapolation of air temperature above/below first-guess levels.
nml_option.possible_values: `constant' (last valid value), `linear' (linear extrapolation based on last two values), `lapse-rate' (0.0065 K/m from last valid value)

nml_option.name: config_static_interp
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate WPS static data (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_native_gwd_static
nml_option.description: Whether to recompute sub-grid-scale orography statistics directly on the native MPAS mesh (case 7 only)

nml_option.name: config_gwd_cell_scaling
nml_option.description: Scaling factor for the effective grid cell diameter used in computation of GWD static fields

nml_option.name: config_vertical_grid
nml_option.description: Whether to generate vertical grid

nml_option.name: config_met_interp
nml_option.description: Whether to interpolate first-guess fields from intermediate file

nml_option.name: config_input_sst
nml_option.description: Whether to re-compute SST and sea-ice fields from surface input data set; should be set to .true. when running case 8

nml_option.name: config_frac_seaice
nml_option.description: Whether to switch sea-ice threshold from 0.5 to 0.02

nml_option.name: config_pio_num_iotasks
nml_option.description: Number of tasks to perform file I/O
nml_option.possible_values: Integer valued, 0 $\leq$ config_pio_num_iotasks $\leq$ \# MPI tasks, 0 indicates all tasks perform I/O

nml_option.name: config_pio_stride
nml_option.description: Stride between file I/O tasks

nml_option.name: config_block_decomp_file_prefix
nml_option.description: Prefix of graph decomposition file, to be suffixed with the MPI task count

nml_option.name: config_number_of_blocks
nml_option.description: Number of blocks to assign to each MPI task

nml_option.name: config_explicit_proc_decomp
nml_option.description: Whether to use an explicit mapping of blocks to MPI tasks

nml_option.name: config_proc_decomp_file_prefix
nml_option.description: Prefix of block mapping file

package.name: initial_conds
package.description: Used by test cases that produce initial conditions.

package.name: sfc_update
package.description: Used by test cases that produce surface updates.

package.name: lbcs
package.description: Active when lateral boundary conditions are interpolated and written.

package.name: gwd_stage_in
package.description: Active only if GWD static fields are be generated and other static fields are not being generated

package.name: gwd_stage_out
package.description: Active only if GWD static fields are be generated and other static fields are not being generated

package.name: vertical_stage_in
package.description: Active only if a vertical grid is being generated

package.name: vertical_stage_out
package.description: Active only if a vertical grid is being generated

package.name: met_stage_in
package.description: Active only if meteorological fields are being interpolated

package.name: met_stage_out
package.description: Active only if meteorological fields are being interpolated

var.name: indexToCellID
var.description: Mapping from local array index to global cell ID

var.name: indexToEdgeID
var.description: Mapping from local array index to global edge ID

var.name: indexToVertexID
var.description: Mapping from local array index to global vertex ID

var.name: cellsOnEdge
var.description: IDs of cells divided by an edge

var.name: nEdgesOnCell
var.description: Number of edges forming the boundary of a cell

var.name: nEdgesOnEdge
var.description: Number of edges involved in reconstruction of tangential velocity for an edge

var.name: edgesOnCell
var.description: IDs of edges forming the boundary of a cell

var.name: edgesOnEdge
var.description: IDs of edges involved in reconstruction of tangential velocity for an edge

var.name: weightsOnEdge
var.description: Weights used in reconstruction of tangential velocity for an edge

var.name: dvEdge
var.description: Spherical distance between vertex endpoints of an edge

var.name: dcEdge
var.description: Spherical distance between cells separated by an edge

var.name: angleEdge
var.description: Angle between local north and the positive tangential direction of an edge

var.name: areaCell
var.description: Spherical area of a Voronoi cell

var.name: areaTriangle
var.description: Spherical area of a Delaunay triangle

var.name: edgeNormalVectors
var.description: Cartesian components of the vector normal to an edge and tangential to the surface of the sphere

var.name: localVerticalUnitVectors
var.description: Cartesian components of the vector pointing in the local vertical direction for a cell

var.name: cellTangentPlane
var.description: Components of a pair of vectors defining the tangent plane at a cell

var.name: cellsOnCell
var.description: IDs of cells neighboring a cell

var.name: verticesOnCell
var.description: IDs of vertices (corner points) of a cell

var.name: verticesOnEdge
var.description: IDs of the two vertex endpoints of an edge

var.name: edgesOnVertex
var.description: IDs of the edges that meet at a vertex

var.name: cellsOnVertex
var.description: IDs of the cells that meet at a vertex

var.name: kiteAreasOnVertex
var.description: Intersection areas between primal (Voronoi) and dual (triangular) mesh cells

var.name: meshDensity
var.description: Mesh density function (used when generating the mesh) evaluated at a cell

var.name: cf1
var.description: Surface interpolation weight for level k=1 value

var.name: cf2
var.description: Surface interpolation weight for level k=2 value

var.name: cf3
var.description: Surface interpolation weight for level k=3 value

var.name: shdmin
var.description: minimum fractional coverage of annual green vegetation fraction

var.name: shdmax
var.description: maximum fractional coverage of annual green vegetation fraction

var.name: hx
var.description: terrain influence in vertical coordinate, $h_s(x,y,\zeta)$ in Klemp (MWR 2011)

var.name: fzm
var.description: Weight for linear interpolation to w(k) point for u(k) level variable

var.name: fzp
var.description: Weight for linear interpolation to w(k) point for u(k-1) level variable

var.name: zxu
var.description: dz/dx on horizontal coordinate surfaces at u levels

var.name: zb
var.description: Coefficients for contribution from u to omega diagnosis, edge-oriented

var.name: zb3
var.description: Coefficients for 3rd-order correction to contribution from u to omega diagnosis, edge-oriented

var.name: deriv_two
var.description: weights for cell-centered second derivative, normal to edge, for transport scheme

var.name: advCells
var.description: cells used in least squares fit of polynomial for advection

var.name: defc_a
var.description: Coefficients for computing the off-diagonal components of the horizontal deformation

var.name: defc_b
var.description: Coefficients for computing the diagonal components of the horizontal deformation

var.name: coeffs_reconstruct
var.description: Coefficients to reconstruct velocity vectors at cell centers

var.name: bdyMaskCell
var.description: Indicator of whether a cell is an interior cell, a relaxation-zone cell, or a specified-zone cell

var.name: bdyMaskEdge
var.description: Indicator of whether an edge is an interior edge, a relaxation-zone edge, or a specified-zone edge

var.name: bdyMaskVertex
var.description: Indicator of whether an vertex is an interior vertex, a relaxation-zone vertex, or a specified-zone vertex

var.name: w
var.description: Vertical velocity at vertical cell faces

var.name: rho_zz
var.description: Dry air density divided by d(zeta)/dz

var.name: h_oml_initial
var.description: Initial depth of ocean mix layer

var.name: lbc_u
var.description: Horizontal normal velocity on domain lateral boundary edges

var.name: lbc_w
var.description: Vertical velocity on domain lateral boundary vertical cell faces

var.name: lbc_rho
var.description: Dry air density on lateral boundary cells

var.name: lbc_theta
var.description: Potential temperature on lateral boundary cells

var.name: lbc_qv
var.description: Water vapor mixing ratio on lateral boundary cells

var.name: lbc_qc
var.description: Cloud water mixing ratio on lateral boundary cells

var.name: lbc_qr
var.description: Rain water mixing ratio on lateral boundary cells

var.name: rh_fg
var.description: First guess relative humidity with respect to liquid water

var.name: pmsl_fg
var.description: First guess mean sea level pressure

var.name: dz_fg
var.description: First guess depth of soil layer bottom

var.name: zs_fg
var.description: First guess depth of centers of soil levels

var.name: zs
var.description: depth of centers of soil layers

var.name: smcrel
var.description: soil moisture threshold below which transpiration begins to stress

var.name: snowc
var.description: flag for snow on ground (=0 no snow; =1,otherwise

var.name: gfs_z
var.description: geopotential height vertically interpolated from first guess

var.name: uReconstructX
var.description: Cartesian x-component of reconstructed horizontal velocity at cell centers

var.name: uReconstructY
var.description: Cartesian y-component of reconstructed horizontal velocity at cell centers

var.name: uReconstructZ
var.description: Cartesian z-component of reconstructed horizontal velocity at cell centers

var.name: uReconstructZonal
var.description: Zonal component of reconstructed horizontal velocity at cell centers

var.name: uReconstructMeridional
var.description: Meridional component of reconstructed horizontal velocity at cell centers

var.name: rtheta_p
var.description: rho*theta_m/zz perturbation from the reference state value

var.name: rho_p
var.description: rho/zz perturbation from the reference state value, advanced over acoustic steps
